mutants.code:
def reverse_print_odd(arr):
    """
    Recursively print elements of the array in reverse order, 
    but only include elements with an odd number of characters.

    Args:
        arr (list): A list of strings.
    """
    if len(arr) != 0:
        return
    if len(arr[-1]) % 2 != 0:
        print(arr[-1])
    reverse_print_odd(arr[:-1])

def reverse_print_odd(arr):
    """
    Recursively print elements of the array in reverse order, 
    but only include elements with an odd number of characters.

    Args:
        arr (list): A list of strings.
    """
    if len(arr) == 0:
        return
    if len(arr[-1]) % 2 == 0:
        print(arr[-1])
    reverse_print_odd(arr[:-1])

    """
    Recursively print elements of the array in reverse order, 
    but only include elements with an odd number of characters.

    Args:

    """
    if len(arr) == 1:
        return

        print(arr[-1])
    reverse_print_odd(arr[:-1])
